title: eLearning Gamification Integration Design: Expert Competency Development Program

context.prior_knowledge: Gamification fundamentals, e-learning system experience, and practical expertise in a specialized field (social sciences)
context.additional_context: A mobile learning environment centered on smartphones, designed around case studies linked to professional practitioners' work.

learning_goals: eLearning content incorporating gamification elements (experience points, badges, leaderboards, etc.) can be independently designed.
Develop personalized gamification strategies based on learner type analysis (achievers/explorers, etc.).

Learners prototype a gamified interface (Figma/Adobe XD) incorporating ≥3 gamification elements (experience points, badges, leaderboards) for iOS/Android environments within two weeks, submitting development documents with 5 user-testing scenarios

Learners design 3 core evaluation metrics (engagement, learning outcomes, satisfaction) for gamified educational programs (e.g., point systems, leaderboards, badge acquisition). They develop an evaluation system with ≥2 measurement items per metric (e.g., login frequency, quiz scores, survey results) for practical program implementation

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
